00040 void RequestHandlerReportSplit::run() {
00041   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00042   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00043   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00044 
00045   try {
00046     TableIdentifier table(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00047     RangeSpec range(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00048     const char *log_dir = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00049     uint64_t soft_limit = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00050 
00051     m_master->report_split(&cb, table, range, log_dir, soft_limit);
00052   }
00053   catch (Exception &e) {
00054     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00055     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling ReportSplit message");
00056   }
00057 }
